clean_data: Cloud Engineer Cloud Engineer Naperville IL Highly motivated IP Engineer with a burning desire to expand into architecting cloud solutions in AWS I am equipped with 8 years of relevant technical experience within an overall 22 year technical career in Private Cloud IP NetworkingAdministration IP Security Firewall Administration DNS Server Management and Active Directory all within a fastpaced everchanging Telecom environment Adaptable flexible and accustomed to problem solving troubleshooting and multitasking both independently and within highly energized focused teams that deal directly with developers testers and customers Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience Cloud Engineer Nokia Naperville January 2017 to Present United States Member of a 3man team that installed configured and deployed Nokias cloud products for use with the Naperville Wireless Labs including Airframe Telco Cloud Cloud Mobility Manager and Cloud Network Management System Performed Bare Metal installations configurations of RHELKVM OSHypervisor creation and provisioning of the cloud with Nokias CloudBand Infrastructure Software CBIS use of core Openstack services to create virtual elements and Cloudband Application Manager CBAM for automated lifecycle management and application stacks Juniper SRX Firewall Administrator Nokia Naperville Naperville IL January 2016 to Present Installation and administration of Juniper SRX1500 Firewall cluster that serves as the entry point to the Naperville Lab networks for other remote Nokia locations Architected layout and IP plan for HA cluster and implemented all security policies and routing Coordination with IT when access tofrom ITmanaged networks is needed Performance of all Firewall maintenance including JunOS software upgrades hardware replacement and troubleshooting IP Security Active Directory Nokia Naperville IL January 2014 to Present Implementation of local domain controller as part of Nokias corporate Active Directory orchestrated addition of all Lab Windows 710 PCs to domain group policy updates and troubleshooting Conversion of local logins to domain logins via ProfWiz tool use of PDQ Inventory tool for management Implementation of corporate IT security measures on Windows and Linux PCs such as OS Hardening Log Monitoring Qualys Scanning and Remediation of vulnerabilities found in periodic security scans IP Network Administration Nokia Naperville IL May 2011 to Present Co Administrator of Lab IP OSPF network consisting of 700 hosts 30 NokiaALU 7750 and 7705 Service Routers Cisco 7609 routers numerous L2 L3 switches DNS Servers PCs VMs and specialized lab equipment IP subnetting distribution provisioning routerswitch configuration hardwaresoftware updates and troubleshooting Education BS in Electrical Engineering University of Illinois at Chicago Chicago IL August 1988 to December 1992 Skills Bgp Ipv6 Ospf Switching Vpn Dns Networking Nmap Wireshark Firewall Unix Elastic beanstalk Ebs Ec2 Dynamodb Json Python Bash Windows 7 Macos AWS Powershell ELB S3 RDS DynamoDB VPC IAM SQS Lambda CloudFormation Elastic Beanstalk Autoscaling Links
